SELECT SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.SI_HAIJOU_ITEM_ID ,
SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.SI_HAIJOU_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_SI_SHUBETSU_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_SENIN_ID ,
SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.ITEM_KIND , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.WORKDAYS , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.HOLIDAYS ,
SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.DELETE_FLAG , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.DATA_NO , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.USER_KEY , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.TS ,
MS_SENIN.SEI || ' ' || MS_SENIN.MEI AS SENIN_NAME
FROM SI_HAIJOU_ITEM
LEFT JOIN MS_SENIN ON MS_SENIN.MS_SENIN_ID = SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_SENIN_ID
WHERE SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.DELETE_FLAG = 0

SELECT SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.SI_HAIJOU_ITEM_ID ,
SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.SI_HAIJOU_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_SI_SHUBETSU_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_SENIN_ID ,
SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.ITEM_KIND , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.WORKDAYS , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.HOLIDAYS ,
SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.DELETE_FLAG , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.DATA_NO , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.USER_KEY , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.TS ,
MS_SENIN.SEI || ' ' || MS_SENIN.MEI AS SENIN_NAME
FROM SI_HAIJOU_ITEM
LEFT JOIN MS_SENIN ON MS_SENIN.MS_SENIN_ID = SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_SENIN_ID
WHERE SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND SI_HAIJOU_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID

INSERT INTO SI_HAIJOU_ITEM( SI_HAIJOU_ITEM_ID ,
SI_HAIJOU_ID , MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_SI_SHUBETSU_ID , MS_SENIN_ID ,
ITEM_KIND , WORKDAYS , HOLIDAYS ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_HAIJOU_ITEM_ID ,
:SI_HAIJOU_ID , :MS_VESSEL_ID , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :MS_SI_SHUBETSU_ID , :MS_SENIN_ID ,
:ITEM_KIND , :WORKDAYS , :HOLIDAYS ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_HAIJOU_ITEM SET SI_HAIJOU_ID = :SI_HAIJOU_ID , MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_SI_SHUBETSU_ID = :MS_SI_SHUBETSU_ID , MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID ,
ITEM_KIND = :ITEM_KIND , WORKDAYS = :WORKDAYS , HOLIDAYS = :HOLIDAYS ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_HAIJOU_ITEM_ID = :SI_HAIJOU_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
